resources.string:
For you to maximize the benefits of this app, we need your consent to access and use your device ID so you can provide and we can collect and track your feedback about talks.
We will process your data in accordance with the App Privacy Policy. You can adjust or withdraw your consent at any time by sending a request to privacy@jetbrains.com, but doing so may affect how this app functions.

Get reminders about talks that you don’t want to miss.
You will receive a message 5 minutes before the session begins so you have time to get ready.
KotlinConf is the official annual conference devoted to the Kotlin programming language. Organized by JetBrains, it is a place for the community to gather and discuss all things Kotlin.
You can find more information about the conference on the official website:\n
May 22 — Workshops May 23–24 — Conference Bella Center Copenhagen, Denmark
Don't miss our new Lightning Talk track! Enjoy double the inspiration with two 15-minute talks in each time slot.
Come to Hall 1 and seize the opportunity to ask the KotlinConf speakers your questions in person.
Have fun and mingle with the community at the biggest Kotlin party of the year!
KotlinConf 2024 General Terms and Conditions for Visitors
At Monta, we engineer the future of EV charging and tackle industry complexities with a reliable product suite. We connect the EV ecosystem with seamless experiences for a cleaner, healthier planet.

Develocity is the leading software solution for improving developer productivity and the developer experience. It does this by leveraging advanced build and test performance acceleration technologies.
From Error tracking to Performance monitoring, Sentry enables developers to see clearer, solve quicker, and learn continuously about their applications — from frontend to backend.

From startups to multinationals with tens of millions of MAU, Touchlab’s services accelerate and de-risk implementing KMP in production. They also build crucial open-source tools that are widely used.

Cloud-Inject, a new platform developed by the creators of Koin, offers Android Application Architecture Observability for Koin users to manage technical debt, resolve complexity and keep apps scalable.
Empowering Innovation with Kotlin everywhere: Kodein Koders delivers expert training and guidance, unlocking the full potential of Kotlin Multiplatform for Android, iOS, Desktop, and Web.
Mercari is a C2C marketplace with more than 20 million users buying and selling items on a monthly basis. Mercari also offers mobile payment services via Merpay, and cryptoasset services via Mercoin.

Company description: Worldline is a global payments technology company, with a tech community of over 7000 engineers. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses around the world; from your local coffee shop, to global e-commerce players and international banks.
American Express creates digital products and services that enhance the lives of our customers. Technology drives everything we do, and our diverse global work force is critical to our success.
Our all-in-one ticketing software manages your entire ticket sales process. With a wide range of multilingual features and strong data security, Pretix is ideal for different types of events.
Sticker Mule is the easiest way to buy custom products online. Order in 60 seconds and we'll turn your designs into custom stickers, magnets, buttons, and much more. Free worldwide shipping!
Kt. Academy led by Marcin Moskala, books author, speaker, and official JetBrains training partner; offers the highest quality Kotlin education at various advancement levels.
Shape is Denmark’s leading mobile app agency, specialising in native mobile apps with an emphasis on product experience and technical proficiency, delivering impactful solutions for ambitious brands.
The Kotlin Foundation is a non-profit company whose mission is to promote and advance the Kotlin ecosystem.
